I can't answer that, and I don't think anyone else can, Colin Powell said on CNN's "State of the Union." CBS News reports that Dodge-Chrysler is seriously rethinking minivans as an automotive form factor, and that the company plans to completely redesign the iconic American family hauler. We need to seriously rethink the minivan, said Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler, in a recent ABC interview. "We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.
